name: back
description: - POST ('users/register/'): Register a new user to the database - POST ('users/login/'): Login a user to the network, delivering a token - GET ('diary/'): Obtain a complete list of the user's entries - GET ('diary/?page=X?perPage=Y'): Obtain a Y entries, of X page number of the user's entries - GET ('diary/?startDate=X?endDate=Y'): Obtain entries between X and Y dates - GET ('diary/detail/:id'): Obtain detailed information of entry - POST ('diary/): Post new entry to database - DELETE ('diary/:id): Delete diary entry from database - PUT ('diary/:id): Edit diary entry from database - GET ('information/:pageid'): Get detailed information for pageId
